We used Jaccard’s Index ( JI) to determine the similarity of medicinal plants species used by the four healers [ 76]. This index is based on the presence or absence of species on each list. Relating the number of shared species to the total number, the index is expressed as:
(3)
J I = c ⁄
(
a + b + c
)
×
100
where a is the number of species unique to healer a, b is the number of species unique to healer b, and c is the number of species used by both healers.
